name: selatko-map-me
description: Web Application with social media traits for logging visits in a map and sharing them with friends.

scripts.install: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild-2: cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild-3: cd client && npm install && npm run build
